website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular swinging saucer is recognized for its weather-resistant durability and superb safety.
pros: Constructed from a long-lasting steel frame
Water-resistant material holds up under inclement weather conditions
Can hold several children at once
Easy to put together and take apart
Available in several fun colors and designs
cons: A few customers had issues with the swing arriving with missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: The best, safest and highest quality swing out there.
customer_reviews.text: Best Product and Best Company. We searched and searched for a swing both of my sons could pay on. We did not want the webbed version because I did not want an ankle getting twisted nor did they look very comfy. We are so glad we settled on this one. It is TOP NOTCH quality, the stitching and the fabric are strong. The ropes are perfect as well, not that cheesy material that flakes in the sun. Love love love this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Hanne Leon

customer_reviews.title: Swing fabric tore in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This swing is/was awesome!! Except in less than a year the fabric tore on the edge. I have two small kiddos. 6 and 2. They don’t play on it every day. Until now, it has been able to withstand me and the kids swinging on it. I’m not a heavy person. 140lb. So when it said it could withstand way more weight than mine and my kids combined, I was at a loss when it tore. The year is almost 12in long and it happened spontaneously when we were swinging. My kids never take toys or sharp things on the swing. I’m going to contact the company to see if I can get a replacement, but we’ll see!
customer_reviews.author: HannahT

customer_reviews.title: This swing has vibrant colors and is all around pretty sturdy. I cannot speak to how well it ...
customer_reviews.text: This swing has vibrant colors and is all around pretty sturdy. I cannot speak to how well it will hold up with time but as of right now I’m am very impressed with the swing. It was easy to assemble, probably 20 minutes or so from start to finish. It was even easier to hang but we did use an old swing set frame. The swing is adjustable for height but as of the moment it works best for our needs at a higher height. Overall, very pleased with our purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Kadinger

customer_reviews.title: Fabric did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: 1 year old product was taken inside for winter and fabric is already splitting
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Great swing but not quality materials. It's all tore up already and just the 2nd summer using it. Looks like it's 10 years old and is ripped! Would not recommend this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Walls

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t survive one Nebraska winter!
customer_reviews.text: This swing had great reviews when we bought it a year ago. And our swing set has all rough surfaces poly coated. We left it outside and a minute few storms beat this thing against our beam so much that it beat all of the poly coating off of a bolt and metal edge, in turn shredded the colored fabric. And it’s obvious to sight and touch, the color fabric has suffered sun rot. Weather resistant my fanny. Sure it’s easy to install, but you need that for every time you’ll need to take it down to keep it nice. Not worth the $100+ spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.H14

customer_reviews.title: Not so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it was advertised to hold 700 lbs and I believed it would be more sturdy, durable and reliable than a cheaper version of this swing that I had purchased. However, this swing was difficult to assemble. One of the bolts popped out while my nephew was swinging on it, and it ripped easily when it bumped into the tree it was hanging from. A very expensive disappointment. It only lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Came apart in 10 months  :(-updated
customer_reviews.text: ***Update below This was our favorite while it lasted. I thought this swing would last a few years. It lasted 10 months. It is even on our covered patio. Just this morning my son came in and said the swing ripped!! They swing on this almost everyday that is decent weather. We pull it in during bad weather. Probably wouldn't have spent that much money knowing it wouldn't last a few years. Otherwise it has been amazing! ***Emailed customer service and they replaced swing cover since it was still under warranty!! Shipped out today! Just had to send in pictures!!
customer_reviews.author: lindseymae

customer_reviews.title: BEST BIRTHDAY PRESENT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons birthday gift. He said best present ever! What more could you ask for? Maybe that the company is veteran owned? Swing was easy to put together and we bought extra straps because ou tree is pretty high. They look very strong and durable. I recommend the swing for kids smiles galore 😁
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie of 8

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this saucer swing however my grandchildren loved having a ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this swing last spring and put it up last May it faded within a couple of months and now less than a year the thing is ripping. Would not recommend this saucer swing however my grandchildren loved having a saucer swing .....I will be buying another one just not this one
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Swing Get this one.
customer_reviews.text: So I have got to say that this is a wonderful swing. The construction and materials are flat out fantastic. The weight limit of 700# is completely reasonable. And the price at time of purchase was fantastic, especially compared to other options on the market. Really, nothing negative to say here, its a great strong swing that comes with a cover and a bunch of little flags. The directions are simple and easy, and its an American company. All great stuff. I also love all of the videos of stacks of kids in the other reviews, stacking kids on it and laughing is great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May, but it stayed in the box until I installed it toward the end of June. My kids have enjoyed it a lot over the summer, and played with it quite regularly. I noticed today, however, that the colored covering for the edges has already deteriorated and ripped. Less than 2 months of use. Extremely disappointed because it was never misused, and having it rip already makes it expensive for 2 months of play :(
customer_reviews.author: Paula G

customer_reviews.title: Set it up everyone is in love with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product. Set it up everyone is in love with it. I was on it the other day and while I was swinging my husband said hey you can't go on there with the kids. I was like why not... well there's a 250lb weight limit and I said no no it's 400lb. So the Amazon description on all of the Royal Oak saucers that I have found have a weight limit of 400 lbs on Amazon. But if you read the directions, or at least that ones I received in my box from Royal Oak it says 250 lbs? I wouldn't want this thing to break as it's a new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Fabric splitting open after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this swing for our kiddos Christmas. It's only been in the backyard for about 2.5 mths and just started to be used now that the weather is warming up. Love the swing but unfortunately the fabric doesn't hold up and is splitting open in several places. Expected it to last longer than 2 months. ☹
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great big swing straps not included.
customer_reviews.text: Great swing. I paid a discounted price so I'm very happy about that. Not too bad to assemble but takes a sec. Great size to swing multiple kids in! Kids love it! Wish it provided straps tho.
customer_reviews.author: The Bells

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. super sturdy. Holds an adult and 2 children pretty good. I used only a couple of the flags, put them at the top so they dont get in the way. Easy to adjusy the "height". I use a tree swing swivel strap to hang it from our swing set ( actually, I use those straps to hang all the swings, and climbing ropes, etc. waaaaay better in my opinion than drilling through with bolts).
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, quality construction. Thanks RoyalOak. The grand kids love it. I know you don't recommend twisting the straps and provide a nice swivel to prevent it. However, every kid since the beginning of kids wants to twist a swing up and let it spin them around. We'd appreciate some sort of add on device that's made to be twisted so it would spin you around. As grandparents who are concerned about safety, but still want their grandkids to have a good time, we would be compelled to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Whitford

customer_reviews.title: Frayed and ripped after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in Feb 2019 and I have covered it after use. I noticed fraying two weeks ago along the side of the ring. Yesterday, while my 4 year old was playing on it I noticed that when she got off it the fray had ripped completely. Needless to say the kids are upset because I won't let them play on it now.
customer_reviews.author: rinaliana 30

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this. But Ive only had this for 4 months and It's only been gently used. Today, my 2 kids were swinging on it and I heard this pop And rip and I looked down and it's ripping all up. Too expensive to not last any longer than this!
customer_reviews.author: Candace True

customer_reviews.title: Fun tree swing!!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it hanging from a tree in our backyard for about a week, but we all love it so far! I have two boys ages 14 and 15 so they wanted the camo one and have had so much fun on it. It does not come with a swing swivel so I had to purchase this separately. This adds to the fun as it allows it to spin. Seems to be good quality so far and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy

customer_reviews.title: Follow care instructions and enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for multiple kids to fit. Took about 30 minutes to assemble. It has a 700lb weight limit, just make sure you have a branch or something strong enough to hold the weight! I purchased long hanging straps separately. (Doesn't come with them). It's also recommended to not get wet, (rain/sprinklers), but it has metal clips on top of the ropes that make it easy to take down without having to untie your own straps/ropes etc.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: My 3 yr. old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a disk swing to attach to a tree. My three year old did not fully have the motor skills to hold on to the rope and squeeze his legs together at the same time. He fell off multiple times and hated it. So, I returned it and purchased Royal Oak's Saucer Swing. He loves it. It's less work and more fun for him. On top of that his cousins pile on and we are able to push all of them together. Great invention! Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Jediah B.

customer_reviews.title: Nana's birthday gift was the best gift ever.....per my 3 year old granddaughter..lol
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for her 3rd birthday..was a little lieary at first that she might fall off ..but wow !! It's a great size and she has lots of room to sit and absolutely loves it !! It's was even big enough for her mom to get on with her safely !!! Everyone at the party wanted to know where I got it !!!! Thanks a million for making my gift her favorite one !!!!! 😃
customer_reviews.author: debbie page

customer_reviews.title: Everybody loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best! We already have a backyard playset, so it was super easy to swap out our swings for this using the included carabiners. Our son is on the autism spectrum, which is what drew me to this initially - I had seen other parents talk about it. Turns out, it's a hit with everybody, young and old, The kids can both sit on it, or they can push each other. It's brought us hours of enjoyment already!
customer_reviews.author: K. Streeby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did return this specific saucer. ONLY because our daughter likes the one we already have. It is much bigger! This product is of very high quality and very sturdy! I would have kept it if we had another tree in our yard to hang it from! It is a great buy! The flags are super cute! I absolutely suggest buying this is you have smaller one’s, mine are 17, 14, and 7. And they all like to get on at the same time. So well stick with our bigger one for now. Maybe when the grandkids start happening I will repurchase this for them!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Southall

customer_reviews.title: Saw the quality and fun during a family visit!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this at a family members farm. Everyone, young and old was enjoying it so much we purchased this for the times when family (and friends) gather at our house. We have not yet assembled it but all items included appear to be of good quality. We like the fact that it can be enjoyed by all our grandchildren who range in age from 4 to 17! And a load limit of 700 pounds might even allow an occasional adult to also enjoy it. Everything was delivered to us on time and in good order!
customer_reviews.author: Retired Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Safe
customer_reviews.text: My mechanically inclined husband installed easily by himself. My Grandchildren age 3 1/2 and 5 1/2 enjoy immensely. Their mother thought it was wonderful outdoor entertainment. Carbiners could be heavier but are hard to undo, so safe for my young grandchildren. Great for fast swinging or gentle casual reading books and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: GrammieB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this swing, the kids absolutely love it. It's easy to assemble -- especially if you use the enclosed tool, which I forgot about and had to do it the hard way! It's a good quality product, worth the extra $$. You'll need to buy straps, we bought the Royal Oak straps and they are very good quality, too. Just MEASURE how many feet of strap INCLUDING THE DIAMETER OF THE TREE BRANCH! We bought the 4 ft straps and they just barely fit around the branch, had to buy a longer set. But very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fun!  We all love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this at the beginning of spring this year and still going strong. Got a sturdy tree hardware setup for it and viola! Was up in no time and they love it! Easy to adjust the height and love the bright fun colors for the kids. This thing flies!! So don’t put it too close to the tree! Lol love it and well worth the money and giggles are priceless! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Put he swing together quickly and easily. Bought the straps and hung it a tree in the back yard. Took about an hour from opening the boxes to hanging in a tree. Impressed with the quality and strength. The swing arrived a day early and the straps arrived on the day they were scheduled to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Doug570

customer_reviews.title: Great Swing- Awesome Veteran-Owned Small Company
customer_reviews.text: This is the best swing I have ever swung on. We ended up buying two. They are wonderful. We had an issue with one of the covers due to storma and the awesome customer service from this apparently Veteran-owned small business is sending me another one as we speak! We will be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great! Lasts about 2 years with maximum daily use!
customer_reviews.text: Great swing! My kids have loved loved loved it for nearly 2 years. I am finally writing a review because after 2 years it is falling apart. It started with just a small tear and after a recently party it was all over. I’m bummed I have to order another one! For $90 I hoped it would last more like 5 years. But it is well loved. I have 4 kids and it’s a hit with all their friends too!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Strickland

customer_reviews.title: The boys love it & I have gone on it myself
customer_reviews.text: We have installed this on our playscape swing set area. We have taken a swinging bar & a swing to make room for this saucer. The boys love it & I have gone on it myself. Very sturdy & so much fun! The only thing is the difficulty of connecting the bars to make the saucer. The foam that covers the bar get in the way & kind of makes it difficult to connect but appreciate that they’re there for safety padding for the metal bars underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Ropes are too short
customer_reviews.text: Just to add myself to the people complaining about the ropes being too short. Cannot use it without getting extensions. Other than that, no issue, it is a good swing. Update: Have to give 1 more star as I was told that all swings come with ropes that are not too long - this is not a particular issue with Royal Oak.
customer_reviews.author: AP7

customer_reviews.title: Either cover off or swing inside during high wind
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swing. We got it replace to replace one we had for 4 years. Love the cover to keep the bird poop off it BUT......make sure to take the swing in during high wind. Our old one without the cover survived many wind storms. But with the cover on it takes a much greater beating in strong wind. Wish I would have thought that out before hand!
customer_reviews.author: KMorgens

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this so much! Sad to say it faded very fast and only lasted 8 months before it dry rotted and we had to dump it, if u want it to last u have to bring it in when you're not using it, especially in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: AndyBlair

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid and the best tree swing I've ever had or seen
customer_reviews.text: I hung mine from a tree the back yard - the kids absolutely love it and it is extremely sturdy - have had 5 kids or 3 adults on it with no troubles. I did the single point hanging option so it can spin as well as swing and my kids have all but left the trampoline alone since I put this up. Really cannot recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A loved gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 year old granddaughter. After reading reviews I have my doubts about how long it will last. However, if it only lasts the summer I will still consider it money well spent. The family has already spent hours and hours on it and my granddaughter wakes up in the morning, runs to the door and says, “swing now”.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Find something else...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this May of 2018 but wasn’t able to put it up until mid- late summer. We have had this and used for a little over a year and the frame had completely pull apart causing my to get get cut from the rigid metal. The fabric has faded and torn. So bummed for the amount of money we spent for it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well made swing. We areimpressed with the craftsmanship and the way the heavy duty Velcro closures securely cover the bolts and screws. It was easy to put together and the lug wrench provided is a tool superior to anything I’ve ever gotten with a do it yourself project kit. Obviously this company doesn’t believe in shortcuts. If you want something that looks attractive in your yard (cool flags!), wows the kids, that will hold up because it’s well made, this is for you. You’ll want to buy straps that hang from the tree to clip this swing to.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Brown

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfied, but it had a partially frayed rope
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good product but I was disappointed that one of the ropes was partially frayed near the top. It wasn't bad enough to send back and didn't want to go through all the trouble, plus, my granddaughter, who I was installing it for, was coming the next day. I do hope the rope doesn't get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bender

customer_reviews.title: Was nice a item while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: It ripped after normal use :( Initial Review: Veteran-owned family business. Sadly made in China which is likely the cause of my only issue in that some of the stitching is sloppy. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: It's just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I like how strong and sturdy it is. I was a little worried about the frame not supporting my weight, but it does! (I'm 170 +50 for babies and it's rated for 220) my kiddos love it! The swing is amazing, I wish I had a tree big enough to support it. It's not a play structure that totally takes over your backyard. Great for creative play and relaxing. Super simple set up, the instructions say to check every nut and bolt every time before use, and that is actually good advice! The bolts get loose often enough that it's a good idea, but I'm not religious about it. It's awesome! Thanks! Also it came way sooner than expected. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for hours of entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: Best.purchase.ever! Bought this swing for my special needs teenager in Oct. It has been a hit with her, her 2 siblings, and the gang of neighborhood kids. Bought the Tree Swing Hanging Kit from Urban Active Sports. All products have been holding up well even with all the bodies that pile on it to swing. The tree we hung it from is outside our fence so the kids enjoy climbing the tree, then swinging on a close branch to the get to the swing. It has provided hours of entertainment. My special needs daughter loves it. She is 5'3'' and 90 lbs. The swing holds her well if she sits or lays down in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: Kids had a blast until this happened. It was a Xmas gift so while I purchased it in November we didnt get to hang it until April when the winter was over. It’s only June so while it was fun while it lasted it is not worth what I paid for the short amount of time it was used. I had great hopes but am sadly disappointed as are my kids:(
customer_reviews.author: PAC O.

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, the best thing I have purchased for my grandchildren to play with. It was easy to assemble, very sturdy and well made and even comes with a cover to protect it from the elements so you do not have to continually take it down. Because of the adjustable tether, it is safe for toddlers to adults. The kids love it and use it more than any other toy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Perman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swing for the grandkids (5, 3 & 1). It arrived before I was expecting it and the assembly was quick and easy. I purchased the hanging straps with the swing, and they made hanging the swing so easy! I would definitely recommend buying the hanging straps! The kids will get to play on the swing this weekend and I know they'll love it! Until then, I've been enjoying it! :-) **UPDATE** Kids LOVED it! We hung it low enough so the one year old could climb on it himself. I'm glad I purchased this swing and I look forward to lots of fun with the grand kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to us
customer_reviews.text: this swing is a big hit. The kids are having a blast even if they get a bit dizzy. Three 1st grade kids can get on this. One grama and one kid too. The dog loves to chase us around while spinning. We just removed one of the swings and put this in its place --found we needed the rotational device hook up thing to get a 360 spin.
customer_reviews.author: J'town Momma

customer_reviews.title: if you are thinking about it - get it !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our three grandchildren, so far they love it. Looks well made and very sturdy, was easy to assemble with good instructions. We have a very tall tree so we also bought the12 ft Royal Oak Tree straps. Contacted seller with issue I had and they were VERY responsive and resolved my issue quickly. Very satisfied, very professional company and would definitely purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Circle Swing Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: My four year old LOVES this swing, we call it the circle swing. It's easy to get in and out of, and we go "high in the sky" in the swing. It's over year old and in great shape, it's a bit dirty and faded but it's still functioning. I did just end up taking the flags off as we left them on all winter and were a little misshaped. LOVE this swing, we've had multiple kids on it, everyone loves.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dip

customer_reviews.title: This is SO much fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and it seems well made. I like to lay on it with the baby and sway and its so relaxing. I LOVE it!! It's like floating in an innertube without fish touching you and wondering who peed in the water. I see years of fun ahead on it. Let's be honest- I bought it for the kids and I totally use it more than I probably should admit to kids or no kids in my arms, but it's so stinkin' fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlyn B. Brohn

customer_reviews.title: We love our swing, great for adults too!
customer_reviews.text: This swing is super well made, we also bought the straps from this company to hang it from our maple tree. One of the metal supports wouldn't go into the other when we initially bought it but I contacted the company and the were very helpful, fast in responding and sent me out a replacement very quickly. We have left the swing out over the winter and it has been fine being rained on. Very happy with our purchase and what a great company!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, the kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I think the kids are really going to enjoy it. It is nice that mom can get on with the kids as well and that the 3 grandkids can go on together. They can also kick back relax and read a book on it. I have no complaints and am glad I made this purchase. I was originally going with a 26 in round and then decided on the 40 in round and could not be happier. Remember it does not come with anything to hook it to the tree, that has to be bought separately, unless you already have something that will work.
customer_reviews.author: ToDream

customer_reviews.title: High quality swing!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't know what saucer swings cost but was surprised to spend this much. That said, this actually seems like a very good value. I have no doubt this swing will hold up for a long time - buy once, cry once. My daughter loves it and the wide variety of colors makes getting your kiddo's favorite a sure thing. I'll definitely keep this company in mind for future yard items based on the quality of their saucer swing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for the Family
customer_reviews.text: The giant saucer swing arrived very quickly and well packaged. My grandsons were excited as they had seen the pictures of it on the internet. My son-in-law has it set out in the living room ready to be added to the swing set as soon as the weather and time allows. My younger grandson age 5 loves the flags and is eager to decorate the swing straps with them. I'm sure this will provides many hours of fun and good exercise for these children and just pure enjoyment for the whole family. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: kids love
customer_reviews.text: We took this in first 2 Indiana Winters and then left it outsidefor the 3rd and of course it was ruined. Kids loved it and we have to replace. We will leave out all summer but take in during the winter. It was great fun for all ages 1 to adults near the campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Swing
customer_reviews.text: This swing is perfect! Bought it to replace the 3 swings on a playset and couldn’t be happier. Had it hung from a beam inside for a week while assembling the playset and had tons of fun on it there too! My 3 kids can’t get enough of it and I love that I don’t have to push them in swings. Very easy to adjust, and love how quick it is to adjust each side a little differently if its not level.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Beloved swing
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love this swing! More than one can swing together. I love this swing, I sit on it and read ! It is a joyful addition to our home. I bought the swing and the straps. So easy to put together and to install. Recently I had an issue with the swing and contacted Royal Oak with pictures. They responded to my email within hours. They replaced my swing and it was up and bringing joy within days. I can not say enough goods things about the product itself or the company.
customer_reviews.author: upstate grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Lots of FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids (age 1 and 3) love this swing! It is fun when their cousins come over, multiple small children can be on it at the same time. Adults that come over love it too! Not 5 stars because we have had it for less than two months and it is already faded (we have the rainbow color). It doesn't bother me too much (not sure how much more it will fade in future years), it doesn't change the fun factor! It is noticeable because the under side of the swing is still vibrant colors. We plan to bring it inside for the winter to keep it looking as nice as possible. Assembly/installation was fairly simple.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stickelberger

customer_reviews.title: High quality*
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this swing. It's sturdy, colorful, and keeps my son's OUTSIDE! Edited to add: we’ve had the swing for almost a year an a half now, and the fabric is shredding. We live in coastal California, so the swing is not exposed to any severe temperatures, cold or hot. Very little rain this winter. My two boys play hard. But I just wish this swing had lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have put it together and it is beautiful and sturdy. We have new homes going in on our street and it is too noise with all that equipment roaring from 6:00 am to 5:00 pm to enjoy it. Our street is now a detour street for the next 3 weeks. When they are done, then we will go out and enjoy our new saucer. I will then up date this post. At that time I will probably up the stars to 5, but we need to swing in it first.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, but cover rips quickly
customer_reviews.text: We love this swing, my kiddos play on it almost daily in the summer/fall! However, we have only had it a little over a year and the cover is already ripping off, which is extremely disappointing. This is the second one we have had now & both times it only lasted a year. Such a bummer since it’s one of my kids favorite things to play on!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but fading
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It does make a little pop sound sometimes which makes me nervous but it definitely holds its weight. I bought it for my 3year olds birthday and we both get on it together. The color has faded just a little over a month tho
customer_reviews.author: Halie Bidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in January for our grandkids. Their Dad installed it in early April. It got a small rip in the fabric after about 6 weeks of use. Not sure how it happened but I contacted the seller & they promptly replaced it! Great service and a fun product! The grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and parents!
customer_reviews.text: This swing was simple to assemble and is a wonderful addition to our yard!! I enjoy relaxing on it while my kids play outside. I’ll be on it a lot this summer I’m sure! I ordered extra straps to hang it from the tree, as I didn’t have any limbs low enough to work with the straps as they are.
customer_reviews.author: RuaLia's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom of five, so any product we choose to order must be durable and assemble quickly. No one wants to wait for the fun to begin! We have purchased two saucer swings for our yard, and they are popular with all ages. The tree straps are superb and withstand windy conditions and multiple riders. I highly recommend these swings!
customer_reviews.author: Friend In PA

customer_reviews.title: Great swing! Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love these swings!! They are the perfect size for our very tall, 15 year old son who still loves to swing. We also purchased 2 others for the special needs respite program we have at our church. The kids that attend were so excited when we installed them. Putting it together is super easy. The adjustable ropes are a huge help!!! One of the main reasons we went with this particular style. The hardware seems to hold up well too.
customer_reviews.author: RandomStuffJen71

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my kids Christmas present and they loved it! It is pretty simple to put together and looks like it will last a good bit. I liked that it came with a cover so you don’t have to constantly be washing it off and the sun won’t bake it as we live in Tx. All of the cousins want to come over to use it. Only negative would be that the hanging length is pretty short. We have to buy a separate rope to attach to a taller tree branch as it will only hang slightly around 8 ft from a branch. The swing wouldn’t be able to hang low enough if you didn’t have a separate attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kalloway

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swing for my 4, 11, and 13 year olds. They all love it. The youngest can even swing himself. My husband tried it, and said it’s thrilling. I’m sure it can be relaxing, too. We had all 3 on it with no problems. One of the best purchases I’ve made in a while b
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall love it
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this swing! 3 and 5 year old.. but the color is already fading and we've only had it for 1 month, we take it down when it rains, I feel like I could have got it cheaper.. also doesnt come with tree attachment kit just keep in mind
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this swing!
customer_reviews.text: We love this swing! It's big and sturdy enough for a couple of kids. It was pretty easy to assemble too. The only thing I would change is to include a higher quality swivel. Instead of turning on the swivel the straps just twist. We even tried greasing the swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Watson

customer_reviews.title: It is very well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson for his birthday. He loves it. We have it somewhat low on the ground so he can get on it himself or sometimes we swing with him. It is very sturdy and well made and seems to have no trouble holding both of us. I am very impressed and hope to purchase one to be at my house!
customer_reviews.author: L Moody

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my six-year-old grandson‘s birthday. This was replacing a tire swing. He absolutely loves it and loves the fact that he can stretch out, spin around, and even hold his little brother on his lap! It’s sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Well made and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a year ago. My grandson was afraid of it (he was 2). This year he came to visit. He loves it! Can’t keep him off of it! He runs and jumps on it! He loves to rearrange the flags too! He likes to swing ‘high’ and go like a merry go round. I don’t leave it out in bad weather. I use the cover to keep birds off of it.
customer_reviews.author: KCC

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our tree swing. It’s one of our best purchases at the start of the pandemic. My son is 2 years and we swing on it together. We’ve had it for about 6 months now and have made many happy memories swinging on it, and I imagine many more years of fun with it ahead!
customer_reviews.author: mvfelix

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple kids
customer_reviews.text: We love this swing. It's fun for really little kids who don't like to go high, for our 2 year old who just can't get high enough, and for me and my son or multiple kids to ride on together. We put it low to the ground so my 2 year old can climb in by himself and he likes to sit in it and eat snacks or stand in it and swing gently. All the kids in the neighborhood come use it in our front yard. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Say hello to summer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandkids. Very, very well made. It's like a miniature trampoline feeline. And can handle lots of weight. This thing had gotten a trial by fire test run and has surpassed all expectations. Easy to hang. Years of fun.
customer_reviews.author: LissaBobing

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU ARE A GOOD MECHANIC AND HAVE A 2-3 FREE HOURS THEN BUT THIS PIECE OF CRAP, BUT OTHERWISE PASS. MUCH TOO HARD TO ASSEMBLE. HOLES DO NOT LINE UP PROPERLY
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Gaetano

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is so big! We have it hanging under out (very tall) deck. Both kids (4&7) fit on it perfectly. It's colorful, and seems well-made (as in, not cheap appearing). It seems to be holding up well. It helps that being under our deck keeps it out of the weather a little. The adjustable height straps are helpful, so you can more easily adjust how high you want it off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome PA

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this swing for my daughter and we love it! It’s huge, fun, comes with everything- easy to assemble and loads of fun for ALL Ages!! I love that the mesh sinks a little so the kids are secure- so sturdy holds weight as stated and multiple kids can go on at once!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very durable. Grandkids love it! One issue is that a buckle on the cover that came with it broke within the first week. The cover helps keep cats and birds from... soiling the swing surface.
customer_reviews.author: conservative dad

customer_reviews.title: Saucer Swing a Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: This swing was very easy to assemble and install. Instructions recommend to people to make the final ring connections but I found it very easy to do myself. I'll probably go back and install using single chain at the top. The swing has a tendency to rotate back and forth when swinging with two upper connections. Overall though this is an awesome swing. A bit pricey but if it lasts it'll be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Earl Brown

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable swing!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, arrived on time. Easy to assemble/install with2 people. This is the second round swing we have purchased. The first one (a web swing) lasted 2 years before it crumbled apart from rust. It’s definitely a more comfortable swing than the web swings. We are enjoying it, hopefully it will last longer than the first but we are in south florida, lots of humidity & near the ocean. In all my online searches I couldn’t find a swing made of aluminum. That would be my only suggestion. If you can make an aluminum swing, it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swing for our little grandchildren for Christmas as they were going to be here for one week during that time! They are coming again and I went out to look at it and shake off the dust and there are two holes in it! So frustrating as my little kids used it for less than a week! They are two young to have sharp objects in their pockets, so it definitely did not last long!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D.

customer_reviews.title: great but does not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this swing! 5yo and 3yo. It is fabulous! However, I am severely let down but the quality. It has a huge rip in the side after only a couple months of play. The canvas just seems to have ripped through normal play and there is no way to repair it other than ugly duct tape. Sad. Perhaps we got a dud one. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 2 year old son. Only had a few days but appears to be well made and my son won’t stop asking to go outside to swing. It’s nice that it can also hold my weight with my son. We bought the heavy duty straps to hand from our tree and both appear to be really solid. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Love it...though now after 2yrs its tearing!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I liked it so much that i gifted another one to a friend and have referred it to many people. Its been 2yrs and we have many pics & videos to prove how we have beautiful memories with this swing. However the sadly now after 2 yrs , its tearing. Im little surrpised since my grown up girls have used it gently and we have covered the swing to protect it in rain , so i wasnt expecting this wear & tear this early. Wish the seller can help.me with this issue, will be very helpful during this lockdown time ( covid) to keep my kids outdoor and have fun .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice swing. Well made and adjustable. Our grandson is almost 2. We adjusted it very low to the ground so he could get used to the swing. He Loved It! It is very secure, and is nice looking. We purchased the rainbow colored model and didn't realize it also came with colorful flags. It is his favorite place to play.
customer_reviews.author: Pooka

customer_reviews.title: Royal Oaks 40" Saucer Tree Swing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, to be the tree that is getting the "best seat in the house" watching every happy face and hearing every squeal and giggle from my grandchildren as they swing on this wonderful saucer. My son had already installed the straps on the tree limb that had been given the special honor of supporting its precious "swingers".....20 to 30 feet above the ground! After an easy assembly the entire family was summoned to the yard for the christening of the swing. It was fabulous! I know they will enjoy this swing for years to come. ( Great option to have a cover for the swing!)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Graham

customer_reviews.title: Our two 40" Flying Saucer Tree Swings are a hit!
customer_reviews.text: We have lots of tall trees in our back yard. We ordered one swing and after we received it and it was easy to put together we decided we wanted another one so we ordered the second one just a day or two later. We have lots of grand kids. Swings are sturdy and the grand kids had a great time on Thanksgiving Day. We have only had them up a week so can't comment on the durability....they look durable. Did need to contact the company about registering the warranty for both swings. Royal Oak got right back to me and handled my concern. We are very pleased with our tree swings.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria H Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandma says, “Go ahead!”
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandchildren. The swing is well-made, and it’s crazy fun for the kids. A contractor working next door came over to find out where to buy this (he’s a grandfather). You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Snow lover

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Very “tippy”, flipped over on the kids within about 5 seconds even though they were in the middle of the swing sitting cross legs. Would not recommend this for kids under 8 years old. Quality seems sturdy but the design is poor. If the material in the center was deeper the kids wouldn’t flip out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled with my grandson quickly and easily. We have spent hours swinging on this disc swing. Such great quality, it has withstood the summer sun with no deterioration or discoloration. The flags are a nice addition. Follow the directions and safety guidelines and your children will be safe. I will be purchasing this as a gift for my other grandchildren
customer_reviews.author: alphamare of 6

customer_reviews.title: so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 little boys all under the age of 9. They can all sit on this together and they have a blast playing on it. very sturdy and I like that it has padded edges because the 2 year old tends to walk in front of it while the others are swinging and so far no major injuries lol. I bought this to replace a small tree swing that they all used to fight over and now everyone can swing at the same time, it's great! definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: It much more durable than its predecessor. The grandchildren and their friends absolutely love it. The downside- it works the crap out of grandparents -the grandkids want you to swing them higher and higher- my advice is to leave the pushing to the grandchildren's father.
customer_reviews.author: M'Liss Hindman

customer_reviews.title: We ended up needing to purchase an additional kit in order to hang the swing properly.
customer_reviews.text: They are not clear up front that an additional kit with longer straps and swivel hooks should be purchased in order to hang the swing correctly! I ended up spending an additional 30.00 so that my son in law could hand the swing!
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: The mat is already stretched out.
customer_reviews.text: So the mat already looks sooo stretched out. Only the kids have been on it and they are 3,2,1. And my brother who’s only 10. Not super happy . The kids love it they love to swing on it. I’m just nervous with how stretched the mat seems to be after not even a months worth of use .
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Householder

customer_reviews.title: All ages can enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Once we figured out how to hang it from the limb that was 20 feet off the ground, the rest of the assembly went smoothly. Great swing that we bought for the grandkids but everyone of all ages enjoys it. I love hanging out on it and getting some down time.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: This swing would be great if it lasted longer. We’ve had ours for 1 year and it’s torn which exposed the medal which in turn rusted. The kids loved it and it is sturdy but it rips too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A.

customer_reviews.title: Great swing, adult tested, kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: The Royal Oak Giant 40" Flying Saucer tree swing was exactly what we were looking for. My husband and our nephew assembled and installed the swing quickly and the kids were swinging and giggling in it in less than an hour from start to finish. The swing cover is a great idea and a nice touch for making sure that the swing stays in top quality through its lifetime. It's sturdy, safe, adjustable, and exactly right for the kids. A great product that I would recommend to anyone and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bender

product_meta.title: Royal Oak Saucer Tree Swing,Giant 40 Inches with Carabiners and Flags, 700 lb Weight Capacity, Steel Frame, Waterproof, Easy to Install with Step by Step Instructions, Non-Stop Fun!
feature_bullets: YEAR-ROUND FUN: Our giant 40 inches saucer swing with removable flags is popular among children and it's obvious why! Its unique design allows for exciting swinging year-round. Big enough for a single adult and/or multiple kids. It's always a hit at parties and guaranteed to produce roaring laughter and big smiles.

ULTRA SAFE AND BUILT TO LAST: ASTM F963-11 and CPSIA section 101 (a)(2) approved. With a load rating of 700 lbs., this swing can handle multiple children at the same time. We take safety seriously and that's why we only use the strongest and safest materials around like 900D Oxford fabric with industry leading protective coating, no lead and an industrial strength steel frame.

SIMPLE INSTALL: What good is a swing if it's complicated to put together and take apart? We designed our swing with simplicity in mind. Our easy to follow instructions make it a breeze to put together or take apart for winter storage. Hang it from a large tree branch or attach it to a swing set. Please note that Royal Oak Easy Hang straps are sold separately.

WEATHER RESISTANT: Our saucer swings are known to take a beating from the weather and continue looking great. Our unique 900D Oxford fabric with industry leading protective coating means that rain and snow are no match for this swing. We also use commercial grade rope so you don’t have to worry about repairs. We built this swing to handle anything Mother Nature throws its way.

12 MONTH WARRANTY and PATENT PENDING: Warranty against manufacturer defects is provided by Royal Oak (easy registration after delivery). Purchases from any other unauthorized seller under this listing will not qualify. Thank you for your understanding.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,451 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
